snippet: The United States imposes new restrictions just as a European Union court rules that the bloc wrongly imposed sanctions against seven Iranian companies.
abstract: European Union court throws out sanctions on seven Iranian companies, rejecting arguments that they were acting as front companies to bypass punitive measures; ruling comes as United States Treasury issues imposing new restrictions on a network of six individuals and four businesses linked to Iranian oil sales.
lead_paragraph: The United States imposes new restrictions just as a European Union court rules that the bloc wrongly imposed sanctions against seven Iranian companies.

headline.main: Iran Ruling In Europe Draws Anger From U.S.
headline.print_headline: Iran Ruling In Europe Draws Anger From U.S.
